ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Elfson the Dargonslayer Part2
ygData.msgSnippet: One place where I was able to use my Vox Horn and Kelin s Lute to good (area) effect was in the Sol-B bats-bugs.  Any of the rooms/places where you can kill
ygData.messageBody:
One place where I was able to use my Vox Horn and Kelin's Lute to good
(area) effect was in the Sol-B bats-bugs. Any of the rooms/places where you
can kill bats and bugs. I had a healer (cleric) in the group and the puller
would bring as many as he could. With 3 mobs, playing lute for Chords of
Disonance, Chords of Cessation, swap to horn for Denons, rinse repeat. By
the tine the first mob was dead, the second would be nearly down to half
health. By the time the 2nd one was dead, the third one would be way below
half health. You do need a healer but the efficiency of AE DoT songs shines
- and the dragon/god instruments really help.

On other occasions, I will use the Vox horn with Berserker's to add some
dramatic STR stats when ppl in the group are begging for str buffs (rogues,
etc.)

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Friday, October 13, 2000 9:02 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Elfson the Dargonslayer Part2


After our successful hit on Nagafen we decided to take on Lady Vox and the
Ice Giants last night.

One complete heal (doh!) One Superior Heal (Does that mean she was low on
mana?) and 6 dead adventurers later, she fell. I guess the dragon support
our bard plight with Verant as she also dropped her insturment, and this
time, yours truly was given the horn! Gotta love the stats on this thing,
but it bears a question.

When will I ever use it? I haven't pulled out my horn (except to max my
brass skill) since lvl 23 I think...

:-)
